## Carry Recipe
_Front Cross Carry – Base Size – 2 Cross Passes_
- Bunch wrap across back and bring under arms
- 2 Cross Passes in front
- Cross in back
- Can TIF or go over cross passes at hips, under and up for knotless
- Slide baby into the cross passes
- Tighten and readjust, spread passes, shoulder flip optional
